channel.title: NPC patroling
channel.description:
I've never got on how to do this. I want to make a few NPCs walk around. I'm pretty sure I did it right, but he still isn't moving.
Here's what I put in my autospawn
[code] //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Description spawn = 2430 2662 3302 0 2665 3330 2660 3310 2 ADVERTISER[/code]
Thanks in advance

item.title: NPC patroling
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:4, topic:295598”][quote author=Rockin link=topic=391586.msg2916215#msg2916215 date=1250458728]
Tried it, didn’t work. Made the patrol even smaller, and still doesn’t work :S.
[/quote]
They’re not gonna move cause you have walkType 2, change it to 1 or 0, I can’t remember which one is movement but I can assure you it’s not 2.[/quote]

oh ya, thats right. 1 is for walking, 2 is for still XD I didnt even notice he had type 2.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC patroling
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Rockin:

Tried it, didn’t work. Made the patrol even smaller, and still doesn’t work :S.

They’re not gonna move cause you have walkType 2, change it to 1 or 0, I can’t remember which one is movement but I can assure you it’s not 2.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC patroling
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

EDIT: Nvm, got it working. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: NPC patroling
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[quote=“Rockin, post:1, topic:295598”] //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Description spawn = 2430 2662 3302 0 2665 3330 2660 3310 2 ADVERTISER[/quote]

should be:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Description spawn = 2430 2662 3302 0 2660 3300 2668 3308 2 ADVERTISER

I re-ordered and reduced your range cuz they were HUGE

Read full topic
